charges.charge_description: On or about August 25, 2009, in Jackson County, in the Western District of Missouri, defendant, having been convicted of a crime punishable by imprisonment for a term exceeding one year, did knowingly possess, in and affecting commerce, a firearm, to wit: a Grendel, Model P-10,.380 caliber, semi-automatic pistol, which had been transported in interstate commerce, in violation of Title 18, United States Code, Sections 922(g)(1) and 924(a)(2).
